message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $15,000 to start. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm not willing to pay $15,000. I'm looking to stay within a budget of $8,000. Would you be willing to consider a counteroffer of $10,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm looking for. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $12,500 is still above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but no higher. Would you be willing to consider this offer?
